text: Stanisław Szlendak (21 May 1920 – 24 January 1998), was a Polish ice hockey player. He played for Podhale Nowy Targ, KTH Krynica, and KS Jaworzyna during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1952 Winter Olympics. With Krynica he won the 1950 Polish league championship. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:KTH Krynica players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:People from Krynica-Zdrój Category:Sportspeople from Lesser Poland Voivodeship Category:Podhale Nowy Targ players Category:Polish ice hockey goaltenders
title: Stanisław Szlendak
